features/hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hear Shout

  Shouts have a range of approximately 1000m

#  Scenario: In range shout is heard
#    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
#    And Sean is at 0, 900
#    When Sean shouts
#    Then Lucy should hear Sean

#  Scenario: Out of range shout is not heard
#    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
#    And Sean is at 800, 800
    # This means Sean is approximately 1130m from Lucy
#    When Sean shouts
#    Then Lucy should have no shout

  Background:
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0

  @inRange @hears
  Scenario Outline: only hear in-range shouts
    And Sean is at <Seans-location>
    When Sean shouts
    Then Lucy should hear <what-Lucy-hears>
    
    Examples: some simple examples
      | Seans-location  | what-Lucy-hears |
      | 0, 900          | Sean            |
      | 800, 800        | nothing         |
    
  Scenario: Multiple shouts from one person
    And Sean is at 0, 500
    When Sean shouts
    And Sean shouts
    Then Lucy should hear 2 shouts from Sean



  Scenario: Multiple Shouters
    Given people are located at
      | name  | x   | y    |
      | Lucy  | 0   | 0    |
      | Sean  | 0   | 500  |
      | Oscar | 1100 | 0   |
    When Sean shouts
    And Oscar shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear Oscar
    But Lucy should hear Sean

  Scenario: Shouter should not hear own shout
    When Lucy shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear Lucy
cyber-dojo.sh:
NODE_VERSION=8.4.0

echo JASMINE TESTS
echo =============

n use ${NODE_VERSION} /usr/local/lib/node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine \
  JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=tests/jasmine.json

# You have to cd to a specific folder because
#   ~/node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber.js
# contains the line
# require('../lib/cli/run.js').default();
# Go figure!

cd ~/node_modules/cucumber/bin

export NODE_PATH=/home/$CYBER_DOJO_AVATAR_NAME/node_modules

echo CUCUMBER FEATURES
echo =================

./cucumber.js \
  --format-options '{"colorsEnabled":false}' \
  --format-options '{"snippetInterface":"synchronous"}' \
  ${CYBER_DOJO_SANDBOX}/features/*.feature

features/do_not_disturb.feature:
Feature: Do not disturb 
  
   As a shouty user, I want to set a 'Do not disturb' so I don't get 
   notified by all or selected shouts.
   
   Background:
    Given people are located at
      | name  | x   | y    |
      | Lucy  | 0   | 0    |
      | Sean  | 0   | 500  |
      | Oscar | 200 | 200  |
   
   Scenario: Disable all shouts
    Given Do Not Disturb is active
    When Sean shouts
    And Oscar shouts 
    Then Lucy should hear nothing
    
   Scenario: Disable shouts based on hashtag 
    Given Lucy disable shouts containing "#freecoffee"
    When Sean shouts "#freecoffee"
    When Ocsar shouts "#freecake"
    Then Lucy should not hear Sean
    But Lucy should hear Oscar
    
   Scenario: Enable all shouts
    Given Do Not Disturb is inactive
    When Sean shouts
    And Oscar shouts
    Then Lucy should hear Sean
    And Lucy should hear Oscar
